<eos>

Kana Mercy akashanda kwemakore 40 achowana penjeni ye$50,000 pagore, uye anotarisirwa kuwana 5% ye penjeni pagore mushure memakore 20 ekutanga, tinogona kufungidzira kuti achange achikwidziridza penjeni yake nekuti mari inowanikwa kubva mukukura kwezvikamu zvemari kunowedzera nekufamba kwenguva. Kana tichitarisa kukura kwe5% pagore, tinogona kushandisa fomura yekukura kwezvikamu zvemari kuti tinzwisise kuti penjeni yake ichawedzera sei.

Fomura yekukura kwezvikamu zvemari inogona kunyorwa se:
A = P(1 + r)^t
Kuti tizive penjeni yaMercy mushure memakore 30, tinofanira kuziva kuti r (kukura kwegore negore) ndere 5% uye t (makore aashanda) ndere 30. Saka:

A = 50000(1 + 0.05)^(30)
A  50000(2.71828)^30
A  50000(29.198)
A  1,459,900

Zvinoreva kuti mushure memakore 30, Mercy anogona kutarisira kuwana penjeni yegore yakakwira kusvika padyo ne$1.459.900. Asi zvakakosha kuyeuka kuti izvi zvinobva pakufungidzira kuti kukura kwezvikamu zvemari kucharamba kuri pa5% pagore uye kuti hapana zvimwe zvinhu zvinokanganisa penjeni yake.<eos>

question: Zera raAdrian rakadarika raHarriet zvakapetwa katatu uye zera raHarriet ihafu yeraZack. Tsvaka zera revatatu ava riri pakati nepakati  mumakore matatu kana Harriet aine makore 21 izvozvi
llm:

Zera raAdrian rakadarika raHarriet zvakapetwa katatu uye zera raHarriet ihafu yeraZack. Tsvaka zera revatatu ava riri pakati nepakati  mumakore matatu kana Harriet aine makore 21 izvozvi
<eos>
<|assistant|>
Ndinokugamuchirai nemibvunzo yenyu. Kana tichitarisa zera raAdrian, rakadarika raHarriet, uye tichiziva kuti zera raHarriet ihafu yeraZack, tinogona kushandisa fomura yealgebra kuti tizive zera revatatu ava. Tinogona kushandisa fomura inoti:

A + H = Z (Uko A = Adrian, H = Harriet, uye Z = Zack)
H = Z/2 (Nezvekuti zera raHarriet ihafu yeraZack)

Tichitsiva H mune yekutanga fomura neZ/2, tinowana:

A + Z/2 = Z
A = Z - Z/2

Kuti tizive zera revatatu ava, tinogona kushandisa fomura yekuti:

A + H + Z = 3Z/2 (Uko 3Z/2 ndiro zera rakafanana kana vakuru vaviri vakasangana)

Tichitsiva A neZ - Z/2 uye H neZ/2, tinowana:

Z - Z/2 + Z/2 + Z = 3Z/2
Z = 3Z/2

Izvi zvinoreva kuti zera raZack rakafanana nezera raAdrian uye raHarriet, saka kana Harriet aine makore 21, zera raZack rinofanira kunge riri makore 42 (21 x 2). Saka, zera revatatu ava riri pakati pemakore 21 kusvika 42, zvichienderana nekuti vakuru vaviri ava vakasangana kangani. Ndapota, kana mune mimwe mibvunzo kana kuda kujekeserwa, ndibvunzei.<eos>

2. Kana bhegi rimwe rairema 50 mapaundi, uye shefu akatenga mabhegi mana, ipapo huremu hwese hwemabhegi nde: 50 mapaundi x 4 = 200 mapaundi.

5. Saka, kana paundi rimwe rehanyanisi rinoita $1.50, ipapo mari yese yakashandiswa ne: 200 mapaundi x $1.50/mapaundi = $300.
